author: Pema Chodron
message: If we learn to open our hearts, anyone, including the people who drive us crazy, can be our teacher.
title: Thought of the day

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
message: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
message: A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is braver five minutes longer.
title: Thought of the day

author: Angela Schwindt
message: While we try to teach our children all about life, our children teach us what life is all about.
title: Thought of the day
